headline: Ask HN: What is going on with Spotify for Mac?
description:
Is there some deep trouble going on at Spotify that's preventing them from releasing useable software?

Spotify on my MacBook has recently become so unstable that I am going to have to remove it permanently. It constantly messes with my audio settings so that Zoom and all other apps stop working when it's running. My Airpods randomly disconnect whenever Spotify is running and I have to restart to stabilize them again. Every time I restart my computer Spotify hangs and has to be force killed.

I have a relatively recent MacBook pro (But not M1) and standard setup, nothing crazy.

This is getting to the point where I am going to cancel my subscription with them but I wanted to see if other people are having similar issues or it's just me?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: Spotify for Mac发生了什么事？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: Spotify for Mac發生了什麼事？
description_zh-Hans:
是不是Spotify出现了什么大麻烦，使他们无法发布可用的软件？

我的MacBook上的Spotify最近变得非常不稳定，我将不得不永久删除它。它不断扰乱我的音频设置，以至于Zoom和所有其他应用程序在它运行时停止工作。每当Spotify运行时，我的Airpods就会随机断开连接，我不得不重新启动以再次稳定它们。

我有一个相对较新的MacBook pro（但不是M1）和标准的设置，没有什么疯狂的。

这已经到了我打算取消订阅他们的地步，但我想看看其他人是否有类似的问题，还是只有我有？
description_zh-Hant:
是不是Spotify出現了什麼大麻煩，使他們無法發佈可用的軟件？

我的MacBook上的Spotify最近變得非常不穩定，我將不得不永久刪除它。它不斷擾亂我的音頻設置，以至於Zoom和所有其他應用程序在它運行時停止工作。每當Spotify運行時，我的Airpods就會隨機斷開連接，我不得不重新啟動以再次穩定它們。

我有一個相對較新的MacBook pro（但不是M1）和標準的設置，沒有什麼瘋狂的。

這已經到了我打算取消訂閱他們的地步，但我想看看其他人是否有類似的問題，還是隻有我有？
